summary: A memorandum from a BOP Regional Director to the Warden of MCC New York, notifying them of an After Action Review team's upcoming visit to investigate the apparent suicide of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The memo lists the team members and requests logistical support.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the After Action Review, identified as inmate Reg. No. 76318-054 who died by apparent suicide.

events.title: After Action Review Team Arrival
events.description: A team of Bureau of Prisons staff arrives at MCC New York to begin an After Action Review of the apparent suicide of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The Bureau of Prisons initiated an After Action Review following the apparent suicide of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg. No. 76318-054).
The review team was scheduled to arrive at MCC New York on August 14, 2019, to conduct an investigation.
The memorandum lists several BOP staff members assigned to the team, but their names are redacted in the provided text.
The memo instructs the warden to have staff and materials, including videos and electronic records, available for the team's review.
Union representation was to be made quickly accessible during the team's visit.
